problem.p: In the image above, a planet orbits a star, and a moon orbits the planet. Assume there are no other planets in this solar system.
Which choice of system will not be accelerating?

choicegroup.choice: A system composed of the planet and moon.
A system composed of the star and moon.
A system composed of the planet and star.
A system composed of all three objects.
Every possible system of these blocks will be accelerating.
